short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customized new tab page with simple and clean design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- google search
- google search autocomplete
- fully user customizable design
- direct youtube search (type 'yt:' at the beginning)
- managing bookmarks for quick access to other websites
- managing todo tasks

This extension does not collect any kind of personal data!!!
